alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:01PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL CLINTON COUNTY IN SOUTH CENTRAL ILLINOIS... SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND NORTHEASTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES IN SOUTHWESTERN ILLINOIS... At 400 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over St. Rose, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Highland, Lebanon, New Baden, Trenton, Aviston, Albers, St. Jacob, Pierron, and Summerfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
